errors.error_description: Moved PYTHONPATH export before pip install, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: Move export PYTHONPATH=. after pip install --editable .
Remove export PYTHONPATH=. from installation section
Add export PYTHONPATH=. to both installation and usage sections
Replace export PYTHONPATH=. with pip install -e . in installation
errors.golden_answer: Move export PYTHONPATH=. after pip install --editable .
